about_the_game:
Relax...Think...Water...Sand....
Sideral is a game without instructions, without words, first part is to understand what you need to do, then try to solve so many logic puzzles. Only you and your mind will be able to discover the misteries of each part of Sideral Islands....

Sideral has been developed by one single person, with love.
detailed_description:
Early Beta Access



On 24th June 2019, we finnally launch the open beta version of the game for all those who want to enjoy it or participate in the design of new puzzles and minigames for Sideral!

If you think you know some kind of logic game without words or numbers, and want to challange all the players to solve them, make a detailed explanation of how it works and send it to me.

As a open Beta, all improvements, bugs, errors, etc. will be also so much appreciated

All proposals, improvement and ideas in general should be sent to this email:

armagedoomgamesstudio@gmail.com

Best ideas will be implemented to Sideral in the next Updates!

See you!
